file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 28-11-06-04 - GRAVITY FILLER CAP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GRAVITY FILLER CAP - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the gravity filler cap. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 28-11-06-000-801-A GRAVITY FILLER CAP - REMOVAL ALL 28-11-06-400-801-A GRAVITY FILLER CAP - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 28-11-06 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-11-06-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GRAVITY FILLER CAP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove the gravity filler cap. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 541 Left wing 641 Right wing D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the wing top 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing top surface I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Put the ladder in the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 28-11-06 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Lift the lock (2). (2) Turn the gravity filler cap (1) counterclockwise and lift it. (3) Release the cable (3) from the "T" support (4). (4) Remove the gravity filler cap (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 28-11-06 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Gravity Filler Cap - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 641 A ZONE 541 WING (REF.) DET. A 2. LOCK B 1. GRAVITY FILLER CAP 3. CABLE 4. SUPPORT DET. B 145AMM280926.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 28-11-06 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 28-11-06-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GRAVITY FILLER CAP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install the gravity filler cap. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Ladder To get access to the wing top 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Wing top surface I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A WARNING: BEFORE YOU DO THE TASK, OBEY THE SAFETY PRECAUTIONS GIVEN IN AMM MPP 28-00-00/200 TO PREVENT INJURY TO PERSONS AND DAMAGE TO THE MATERIAL. (1) Put the gravity filler cap (1) in position. (2) Install the cable (3) on the "T" support (4). (3) Turn the gravity filler cap (1) clockwise. (4) Lower the lock (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 28-11-06 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the ladder from the work area. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 28-11-06 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
